org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner

Class PlannerFactoryImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.common.map_planner.PlannerFactory
      • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_planner.PlannerFactoryImp

  • public class PlannerFactoryImp
extends PlannerFactory
    Configuration class; from the grounded task, it builds the objects necessary for the planner to work.
    Since:
    1.0
